section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have a disposition to announce in Scott against the Kentucky Parole Board, Number 64-38, and for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the Clerk of the Court this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals of the Sixth Circuit is vacated.
The case is remanded to that Court for consideration of the question of mootness.
Mr. Justice Stevens with whom Mr. Justice Brennan and Mr. Justice Powell would join filed a dissenting opinion.
